page.title: 20NEW SCHOOL/COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: In 1983 it was decided to build a new school and as the Community Council wanted to build a Community Centre it was agreed to have them both as one building. Part of the playing field was sold to the County Council and work started in July 1985. It is expected to take 15 months to finish the building. The new school will have three classrooms, an activity area for doing messy things, a library and rooms for the teachers. The big hall will be shared by the school and the Community Council. It will be used by the school during the day and the Community Council will use it during the evenings, weekends and sometimes during the day. They will have their own kitchen and bar, changing rooms and cloakrooms.
